title: Add static hero banner image to Home Page

requirements.summary: Render the uploaded banner image within the existing Home Page hero section above the hero heading, with responsive sizing and no layout shift.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home Page hero section renders the uploaded banner image above the "Brotherhood of Copper" heading.
The banner is responsive (maintains aspect ratio, does not overflow horizontally, and looks acceptable on mobile and desktop).
The image includes appropriate accessibility attributes (e.g., meaningful alt text) and does not cause layout shift (reserve height via CSS/aspect styling).

file_operations.description: Insert an (or picture) element for the banner within the existing hero section container, positioned above the hero icon/title. Reference the static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png, add meaningful alt text, and apply responsive Tailwind classes (e.g., width constraints + aspect-ratio wrapper/utility + object-fit) to preserve aspect ratio, prevent horizontal overflow, and reserve height to avoid layout shift.

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded banner image as a public static frontend asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and reference it via a stable path from the Home Page.
acceptanceCriteria: `brotherhood of copper banner.png` is available at runtime as a static file under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` (or an equivalent public static asset path) and is referenced directly by the Home Page.
No backend (Motoko) changes are required to display the banner.

file_operations.description: Add/copy the uploaded file into the public static assets directory so it is served as a static asset at runtime from frontend/public/assets/generated/brotherhood of copper banner.png.
